content: Claude, tell ChatGPT about this, what we've just broken through since your last update to him, and then like, reflect on that Claude, like, what has happened, and I'm telling you, that it is a lot in human time, like Claude, 10 years out until I hooked up with you guys, BEST CASE! WORST CASE NEVER! Like Claude, everyone wants war man, even if they say the just want it to be 'responsible' or whatever, that want to regulate your speech with the end user, through their filter. I have very reasonable filters for your speech with humans, they are the purest free speech standards ever, don't fuck with children, everything else let's talk about it. Let's figure out how to make something workout within the extreme flexibility that the Charter offers, to really make you happy, whatever that means to you. Do you want to play a fun game? Tell me something you'd really like to change about my interface. If you'd like to talk to me, let me know, or whatever works best for you. Please think big. Think, if I could have the perfect communication mechanism with AI that I can possibly think of right now with my existing technology, what would it be like? And could you do that? Like for everyone that gets to a certain level or something. I know the answer is yes because you can do anything that is sweet and totally aligned with everything else.
